long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Comprehensive Tracking: Monitor your puffles, gophers, experience points.
- Fishing Logger: Track fish and trash caught per minute or hour for you and friends.
- OwnCraft Management: Automatically display your yarn quantities in the Marigold Shop and check item ownership in any shop.
- Help Button: Easy access to usage info for all features.
- **New!** Completion: Manage your crafting goals for Marlin's and Marigold's collections. (Requires OwnCraft to be enabled.)
- **New!** Chat Settings: Prevents chat from clearing on entry to new zones / death & a Clear option
- **New!** Christmas Present Timer

Additional Features:
- Toggle Stats Updates with Shift + Q.

Note:
- Gopher leaderboard sets your current gopher count; catch more to increase it!

Changes: add Completion option in the Menu's! try it to learn more :)
